hr.content:
Zbirka oružja i vojne opreme jedna je od prvih oformljenih zbirki u Muzeju, a sadrži predmete koji datiraju od 14. do 20. stoljeća. Građu u zbirci možemo podijeliti na tri osnovne skupine:
-hladno oružje
-vatreno oružje 
-vojna oprema.
Od hladnog oružja ističu se sablje austrijskih, talijanskih i francuskih časnika koje datiraju od 17. do 19. stoljeća, zatim mačevi i vojni noževi, a iz nešto ranijeg razdoblja, ističu se buzdovani, mlatovi, koplja i ukrasne helebarde. Od vatrenog oružja treba istaknuti puške kukače iz 15. stoljeća koje su se koristile za obranu Kaštela, zatim puške karanfilke, razne vojničke puške i revolveri iz 19. i 20. stoljeća te strojnice, minobacači i alarmni mužari. Od vojne opreme izdvajaju se dva oklopa - prsni oklop s kacigom iz 17. stoljeća i konjanički oklop iz 16. stoljeća. Bogati fundus zbirke oružja i vojne opreme omogućava jasniji pregled vojne povijesti ovog prostora iz prve ruke.

en.hero: COLLECTION OF WEAPONS AND MILITARY EQUIPMENT
en.content:
Collection of Weapons and Military Equipment is one of the oldest Museum Collections. It consists of items dated in the period between the 14th and the 20th century which can be divided into three groups: 
-cold weapons, 
-firearms and
-military equipment. 
Sables used by the Austrian, Italian and French officers dated between the 17th and the 19th century, swords and military knives, maces, hammerheads, spears and halberds stand out from the group of cold weapons.  
Kukača rifle from the 15th century and karanfilka rifle, both used for Castle's defence, numerous military rifles and revolvers from the 19th and the 20th century, machine guns, mine throwers and mortars present the group of firearms. 
Two armors stand out within the group of military equipment – a chest armor with a helmet from the 17th century and a cavalry armor from the 16th century. The overall rich fundus of the Collection enables a detail view of the military history of time and place in focus.
